EmailTemplate.name: 2020_EMEAI_HOC_MC.2020_EMEAI_HOC_EMAIL 4_Jim and Elie_PM
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Jim Currier and Elie Khatami at Prague
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Our inventors and engineers are continually pushing technological frontiers, literally making the future. And everything we create is inspired by our most important users – you.
The Honeywell Aerospace’ EMEAI Customer & Product Support Group cordially invites you to attend the Operators Conference 2020 which is held in Prague from March 3 - March 5.
<https://youtu.be/urpHkJzgXOM> Watch video <https://youtu.be/urpHkJzgXOM>
Join us in Prague to network with your peers and Honeywell experts and empower yourself with information on how our investment in technology can help you work on tomorrow, today, to build a competitive advantage.
As we have limited seats available, please ensure to reserve yours.
We look forward to seeing you in Prague.
Honeywell Events Team REGISTER NOW AND REVIEW AGENDA <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/03/cps-airline-conference]]>
